name: test_e2e_with_logs[071_XSS_DOM_006]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_DOM_006` |
| **Name** | Eval-based DOM XSS |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | dom_xss |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `eval('alert("DOM XSS")')`

- **Expected Detection**: Yes
